customer_addr:
1425 Plain-City Georgesville Rd, JM 10
West Jefferson, OH 43162

citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany the APHIS Official during the inspection process at 10:45am on
9/12/2025. The inspector attempted to contact the registrant by arriving at the facility and reporting to the security building.
The security officer informed the inspector that the facility is closed, there are no more animals at the facility, and there
are no employees who report to the building previously occupied by the business. There is no forwarding phone number.
The registrant is required to notify the Deputy Administrator of any change in business operations under §2.27 of the
Animal Welfare Act. Failure to provide access to the facility, animals, and records for inspection is a serious violation of
the AWA and regulations. Failure to comply may result in enforcement action.
End Section

narrative:
2.38(b) 
   
Miscellaneous. 
A responsible adult was not available to accompany the APHIS Official during the inspection process at 10:45am on 
9/12/2025. The inspector attempted to contact the registrant by arriving at the facility and reporting to the security building. 
The security officer informed the inspector that the facility is closed, there are no more animals at the facility, and there 
are no employees who report to the building previously occupied by the business. There is no forwarding phone number. 
The registrant is required to notify the Deputy Administrator of any change in business operations under §2.27 of the 
Animal Welfare Act. Failure to provide access to the facility, animals, and records for inspection is a serious violation of 
the AWA and regulations. Failure to comply may result in enforcement action. 
 
 
End Section
